title.rendered: Air Flamenco Head Office: Ticket Booking, Fleet and Cargo

content.rendered:
Air Flamenco traces its history to Flamenco Airways, which was founded in 1976 by Mr. Ruben Torres. The first aircraft used was the Piper Cherokee 6 with flights between the islands of Culebra and Vieques. Six months after initial operation they acquired their first twin engine Britten-Norman Islander with a capacity of 9 passengers. With this new aircraft their service expanded with more passenger routes and US postal service between the two islands of Vieques and Culebra and the main island of Puerto Rico. Within the following five years, the airline increased its fleet to 6 aircraft expanding its services and charter flights throughout the Caribbean Islands including US and British Virgin Islands.In 2009 the airline acquired 2 other Britten Norman Islanders for cargo flights.

 

Air Flamenco Address: Culebra, Puerto Rico, USA

Air Flamenco Phone: 787-724-1818

Flamenco Cargo: 787-726-2441

Fax: 787-724-6345

Email: customerservice@flyairflamenco.com

Cargo : frontdesk@flamencocargo.com

Air Flamenco Official website: https://flyairflamenco.com/

Air Flamenco Baggage Allowance

Air Flamenco Baggage Allowance

View Air Flamenco Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Travelling with Pet in Air Flamenco :

For more details visit : https://flyairflamenco.com/tickets-terms-and-conditions/#wearepetfriendly

 Queries handled Air Flamenco Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Air Flamenco Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Air Flamenco : (click on the stars below)
